AdminUpdateListing   

Description Updates listings 

Pre Condition 

1. Administrator is logged into the lsitings page. 

Post Condition 

1.Listing will be updated with new data 

Basic course of Action 

1. Administrator visits the update listings page. 

2. Administrator enters new information to be updated. 

3. System verifies new information. 

4. System displays preview of listing page 

5. Administrator confirms new listing 

6. System displays updated listings page. 

7.Use case ends.
